name: Sight's Adventure Verse Five
description: Join Sight as he travels through different environments on his biggest adventure yet! This game is filled to the brim with biblical references and trivia! Alongside that, you'll be able to use boomerangs to help you progress through the game and take on new and familiar bosses! There's a normal mode for players who want a bit more challenge, and an easy mode for a more relaxed experience. Playing the other four games are not necessary, but you'll recognize some characters and references if you had.
